column(a) ^ height(a, 7)
Create a vertical line using 7 blocks.
square(b) ^ size(b, 9) ^ right(b, a)
After that, create a 9 block by 9 block square to the right of the vertical line.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(east, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the upper left corner of the square is adjacent to the vertical line's bottom end.
restricted(9, 0)
Do not put a block in the space at row 0 and column 9.

Next, create a row of length 3 to the left of the vertical line.

Ensure that the right end of the row is adjacent to the fourth row of the vertical line.

Next, create another one to the top of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)

row(b) ^ width(b, 7) ^ left(b, a)
Then, construct another one to the left of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that this row's right end is adjacent to the first row's left end.
restricted(2, 8)
Do not put a block in the space at row 8 and column 2.

===
rectangle(a) ^ height(a, 3) ^ width(a, 5)
Create a 5 by 3 rectangle.
row(b) ^ width(b, 5) ^ bottom(b, a)
Then, construct a row using 5 blocks to the bottom of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the row's left end is next to the rectangle's lower left corner.

Then, build a 10 by 9 rectangle to the left of the row.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ right_side(b, c, 4) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)

===
column(a) ^ height(a, 4)
Form a vertical line of height 4.
row(b) ^ width(b, 7) ^ bottom(b, a)
After that, form a row of size 7 to the bottom of the vertical line.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ top_side(b, c, 2) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the third column of the row is next to the bottom end of the vertical line.

row(a) ^ width(a, 6)
Build a horizontal line of length 6.
rectangle(b) ^ height(b, 6) ^ width(b, 3) ^ left(b, a)
After that, form a rectangle that is 3 blocks wide and 6 blocks tall to the left of the horizontal line.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ right_side(b, c, 3) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the fourth row of the rectangle is next to the horizontal line's left end.
restricted(6, 5)
Do not put a block in the space at row 5 and column 6.

Next, build a horizontal line with 6 blocks to the left of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ left_side(a, d, 1) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the right end of the horizontal line is adjacent to the second row of the rectangle.
restricted(3, 8)
Do not put a block in the space at row 8 and column 3.

column(a) ^ height(a, 6)
Build a column using 6 blocks.
rectangle(b) ^ height(b, 5) ^ width(b, 4) ^ bottom(b, a)
Then, create a 4 by 5 rectangle to the bottom of the column.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the rectangle's upper right corner is adjacent to the column's bottom end.
restricted(4, 9)
Do not put a block in the space at row 9 and column 4.

Next, create a row of size 7 to the bottom of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ bottom_side(a, d, 4) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the row's right end is adjacent to the fifth column of the rectangle.
restricted(0, 0)
Do not put a block in the space at row 0 and column 0.

block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the lower right corner of the square is adjacent to the rectangle's upper left corner.
restricted(10, 10)
Do not put a block in the space at row 10 and column 10.

Ensure that this square's upper left corner is adjacent to the fourth column of the first square.

Ensure that the fourth column of the rectangle is next to the column's bottom end.

Ensure that the square's upper right corner is adjacent to the third column of the horizontal line.

Ensure that the left end of the new horizontal line is next to the first horizontal line's right end.
restricted(0, 0)
Do not put a block in the space at row 0 and column 0.

row(a) ^ width(a, 7)
Create a horizontal line of length 7.
row(b) ^ width(b, 7) ^ left(b, a)
After that, create another one to the left of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the right end of this horizontal line is aligned with the left end of the first horizontal line.
restricted(8, 8)
Do not put a block in the space at row 8 and column 8.

Build a rectangle with a width of 3 blocks and a height of 10 blocks.
column(b) ^ height(b, 5) ^ top(b, a)
After that, create a column using 5 blocks to the top of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ top_side(a, d, 1) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the column's bottom end is next to the second column of the rectangle.
restricted(8, 8)
Do not put a block in the space at row 8 and column 8.

row(a) ^ width(a, 6)
Create a row with 6 blocks.
row(b) ^ width(b, 6) ^ top(b, a)
Next, build another one to the top of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ top_side(a, d, 3) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the left end of the horizontal line is next to the fourth column of the row.
restricted(3, 10)
Do not put a block in the space at row 10 and column 3.

Next, form a square with sides of block length 7 to the top of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the lower right corner of the square is next to the rectangle's upper left corner.

===
rectangle(a) ^ height(a, 6) ^ width(a, 7)
Form a rectangle with a width of 7 blocks and a height of 6 blocks.
rectangle(b) ^ height(b, 6) ^ width(b, 7) ^ bottom(b, a)
After that, construct another one to the bottom of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ bottom_side(a, d, 2) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the upper left corner of this rectangle is next to the third column of the first rectangle.

O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

===
square(a) ^ size(a, 2)
Construct a 2 by 2 square.
rectangle(b) ^ height(b, 7) ^ width(b, 6) ^ left(b, a)
After that, create a rectangle that is 7 blocks tall and 6 blocks wide to the left of the square.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ right_side(b, c, 1) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the second row of the rectangle is next to the square's upper left corner.
restricted(4, 3)
Do not put a block in the space at row 3 and column 4.

Ensure that the fourth column of the row is next to the bottom end of the vertical line.
restricted(0, 7)
Do not put a block in the space at row 7 and column 0.

Ensure that the row's left end is next to the third row of the square.
restricted(2, 5)
Do not put a block in the space at row 5 and column 2.

===
square(a) ^ size(a, 2)
Build a square with sides of block length 2.
square(b) ^ size(b, 2) ^ right(b, a)
Next, create another one to the right of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(east, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the new square's lower left corner is adjacent to the upper right corner of the first square.

Ensure that the upper left corner of the new rectangle is adjacent to the lower right corner of the first rectangle.

===
row(a) ^ width(a, 3)
Create a horizontal line with 3 blocks.
column(b) ^ height(b, 10) ^ bottom(b, a)
After that, form a column using 10 blocks to the bottom of the horizontal line.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the column's top end is aligned with the left end of the horizontal line.

O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

===

Form a column of height 3.
row(b) ^ width(b, 9) ^ top(b, a)
After that, build a horizontal line using 9 blocks to the top of the column.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ bottom_side(b, c, 5) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the sixth column of the horizontal line is adjacent to the top end of the column.
restricted(4, 5)
Do not put a block in the space at row 5 and column 4.

Ensure that the right end of the row is next to the fifth column of the square.

Then, create a vertical line with 3 blocks to the top of the square.

Ensure that the vertical line's bottom end is aligned with the upper left corner of the square.

rectangle(a) ^ height(a, 9) ^ width(a, 8)
Form a rectangle that is 8 blocks wide and 9 blocks tall.
column(b) ^ height(b, 5) ^ top(b, a)
Next, construct a vertical line of size 5 to the top of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ top_side(a, d, 1) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the vertical line's bottom end is next to the second column of the rectangle.
restricted(2, 8)
Do not put a block in the space at row 8 and column 2.

Ensure that the top end of the column is next to the lower left corner of the square.

rectangle(a) ^ height(a, 10) ^ width(a, 2)
Form a rectangle with a width of 2 blocks and a height of 10 blocks.
rectangle(b) ^ height(b, 10) ^ width(b, 2) ^ right(b, a)
Then, form another one to the right of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ right_side(a, d, 4) ^ spatial-rel(east, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that this rectangle's lower left corner is adjacent to the fifth row of the first rectangle.

Ensure that the rectangle's lower left corner is next to the horizontal line's right end.

After that, create a rectangle that is 3 blocks tall and 5 blocks wide to the top of the square.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ top_side(a, d, 4) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the lower left corner of the rectangle is adjacent to the fifth column of the square.

block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the right end of the row is next to the lower left corner of the rectangle.

===
square(a) ^ size(a, 4)
Build a 4 block by 4 block square.
rectangle(b) ^ height(b, 7) ^ width(b, 2) ^ bottom(b, a)
Then, create a rectangle with a height of 7 blocks and a width of 2 blocks to the bottom of the square.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the upper left corner of the rectangle is adjacent to the square's lower left corner.

O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

After that, construct a 9 by 7 rectangle to the top of the vertical line.

Ensure that the third column of the rectangle is next to the top end of the vertical line.

After that, create another one to the bottom of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the top end of the new vertical line is adjacent to the bottom end of the first vertical line.

===
row(a) ^ width(a, 6)
Form a row using 6 blocks.
rectangle(b) ^ height(b, 2) ^ width(b, 7) ^ bottom(b, a)
Next, build a rectangle that is 2 blocks tall and 7 blocks wide to the bottom of the row.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the rectangle's upper left corner is adjacent to the row's right end.
restricted(9, 3)
Do not put a block in the space at row 3 and column 9.

O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

===
square(a) ^ size(a, 2)
Form a square with sides of block length 2.
column(b) ^ height(b, 3) ^ bottom(b, a)
Then, build a column using 3 blocks to the bottom of the square.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the top end of the column is next to the square's lower right corner.

Form a 3 by 3 square.
column(b) ^ height(b, 8) ^ left(b, a)
After that, form a vertical line using 8 blocks to the left of the square.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the bottom end of the vertical line is aligned with the lower left corner of the square.
restricted(3, 10)
Do not put a block in the space at row 10 and column 3.

Ensure that the fourth column of the horizontal line is next to the vertical line's bottom end.

Then, create a vertical line using 5 blocks to the bottom of the square.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the top end of the vertical line is aligned with the lower left corner of the square.
restricted(0, 10)
Do not put a block in the space at row 10 and column 0.

square(b) ^ size(b, 7) ^ bottom(b, a)
Next, form another one to the bottom of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ bottom_side(a, d, 3) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the upper left corner of the new square is next to the fourth column of the first square.
restricted(6, 7)
Do not put a block in the space at row 7 and column 6.

Ensure that the right end of the row is adjacent to the horizontal line's left end.

Form a rectangle with a width of 6 blocks and a height of 10 blocks.
row(b) ^ width(b, 7) ^ bottom(b, a)
Next, form a horizontal line of size 7 to the bottom of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ lower_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the right end of the horizontal line is next to the lower right corner of the rectangle.
restricted(9, 1)
Do not put a block in the space at row 1 and column 9.

column(b) ^ height(b, 7) ^ left(b, a)
Then, construct another one to the left of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ left_side(a, d, 2) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the top end of the vertical line is adjacent to the third row of the column.
restricted(8, 5)
Do not put a block in the space at row 5 and column 8.

row(b) ^ width(b, 10) ^ right(b, a)
After that, form a horizontal line of length 10 to the right of the column.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ right_side(a, d, 4) ^ spatial-rel(east, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the left end of the horizontal line is adjacent to the fifth row of the column.

row(a) ^ width(a, 9)
Form a row using 9 blocks.
square(b) ^ size(b, 10) ^ bottom(b, a)
Next, build a 10 by 10 square to the bottom of the row.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ bottom_side(a, d, 2) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the square's upper left corner is next to the third column of the row.

After that, build a square with sides of block length 3 to the left of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(west, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the square's lower right corner is adjacent to the rectangle's upper left corner.

===
column(a) ^ height(a, 3)
Create a vertical line with 3 blocks.
square(b) ^ size(b, 2) ^ right(b, a)
Then, form a square with sides of block length 2 to the right of the vertical line.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(east, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the upper left corner of the square is adjacent to the top end of the vertical line.
restricted(6, 10)
Do not put a block in the space at row 10 and column 6.

O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

===
rectangle(a) ^ height(a, 9) ^ width(a, 5)
Form a rectangle that is 9 blocks tall and 5 blocks wide.
square(b) ^ size(b, 5) ^ right(b, a)
After that, build a square with sides of block length 5 to the right of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_right(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(east, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the upper left corner of the square is adjacent to the upper right corner of the rectangle.
restricted(6, 6)
Do not put a block in the space at row 6 and column 6.

Ensure that the top end of the column is adjacent to the third row of the rectangle.

Ensure that the lower left corner of the rectangle is next to the sixth column of the horizontal line.
restricted(7, 8)
Do not put a block in the space at row 8 and column 7.

Ensure that the upper right corner of the rectangle is adjacent to the fourth column of the horizontal line.

Ensure that the row's right end is aligned with the upper left corner of the square.
restricted(0, 8)
Do not put a block in the space at row 8 and column 0.

After that, build a rectangle that is 10 blocks wide and 7 blocks tall to the left of the square.

Ensure that the third row of the rectangle is next to the upper left corner of the square.
restricted(3, 3)
Do not put a block in the space at row 3 and column 3.

Next, create another one to the right of the first one.

Ensure that the bottom end of the column is adjacent to the top end of the vertical line.
restricted(6, 9)

Then, create a row with 6 blocks to the right of the square.

Ensure that the left end of the row is adjacent to the third row of the square.

row(b) ^ width(b, 9) ^ left(b, a)
After that, form a horizontal line with 9 blocks to the left of the column.

Ensure that the right end of the horizontal line is aligned with the bottom end of the column.
restricted(8, 4)
Do not put a block in the space at row 4 and column 8.

rectangle(a) ^ height(a, 10) ^ width(a, 2)
Form a rectangle that is 2 blocks wide and 10 blocks tall.
column(b) ^ height(b, 4) ^ right(b, a)
After that, build a column using 4 blocks to the right of the rectangle.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_left(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ right_side(a, d, 5) ^ spatial-rel(east, 0, w2, w1)
Ensure that the column's top end is next to the sixth row of the rectangle.

Ensure that the right end of the row is next to the second column of the rectangle.

After that, form another one to the bottom of the first one.
block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ upper_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ bottom_side(a, d, 6) ^ spatial-rel(south, 0, w2, w1)

block(c) ^ location(w1) ^ block-location(c, w1) ^ lower_right(b, c) ^ block(d) ^ location(w2) ^ block-location(d, w2) ^ upper_left(a, d) ^ spatial-rel(north, 0, w2, w1)

restricted(9, 2)
Do not put a block in the space at row 2 and column 9.
